text: The 1990 Akron Zips football team represented Akron University in the 1990 NCAA Division I-A football season as Division I-A independents. They were led by fifth–year head coach Gerry Faust. The Zips played their home games at the Rubber Bowl in Akron, Ohio. They finished the season with a record of 3–7–1. ==Schedule== ==References== Akron Category:Akron Zips football seasons Akron Zips football
title: 1990 Akron Zips football team
